website_summaries.verdict: If the child in your life loves squishy toys, this is the perfect advent calendar.
pros: Includes 24 different squishy toys, including a snowman, Santa, chick, bear, and rabbit
Meant for children ages 3 and up
Toys don't have a strong smell like some other squishy toys
cons: Some said they toys were a little sticky

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old boy doesn’t care that it got dirty and the design on the squishy stared fading within minutes. I don’t think I will buy it again but it is serving its purpose (using it more for reward to take his medication every day). It did arrive on time with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C

customer_reviews.title: Not what is shown
customer_reviews.text: This product is not what is advertised! Yes, the squishier are cute but in 11 days, the only colors they’ve come in are white and yellow. The photo show multiple colors of squishier. We ordered 2 and both kids like it but are disappointed that they all are white and yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Dobbick

customer_reviews.title: Great Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Kids absolutely loved opening these each day in December! I would recommend these to anyone with older than 6 year olds who don’t want socks or LEGO Advetn calendars. I even got one to be my writing buddy!
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Terrible toy quality
customer_reviews.text: The squishies are a terrible material that falls apart in your hand if you okay with it at all. Drop it on the ground? Catches all the dirt and hair you could imagine. My toddler is not happy 😐
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea but Awful Toys
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this advent calendar for my squishy-loving girl, but these toys are a disappointment for sure. They have a disgusting, sticky texture that pick up dirt and hair and the painted on features rub off almost immediately. They are enjoying opening them daily, but I have to fight the urge to throw them directly in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: E.Smith

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute, for like 3 and under, but very boring and cheap for older kids
customer_reviews.author: Bekah

customer_reviews.title: Affordable non-food alternative to crappy chocolate advent calendars
customer_reviews.text: My kids went nuts over this adorable advent calendar. The squishies are a perfect alternative to chocolate advent calendars or expensive toy advent calendars. We we will definitely buy these again next year!
customer_reviews.author: Merlyn Otto

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to son - he loves it!!! The pieces are soft and mushy. Adorable characters.
customer_reviews.author: SS16

customer_reviews.title: Honest review
customer_reviews.text: All the faces were either stuck to the plastic or came of soon. The cardboard did not stay intact making each day a surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute & fun!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 2 year old daughter this year and she really loved it. The only bad thing is the little toys get so dirty and they are not washable.
customer_reviews.author: Tanis

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved these cute little squishies!!! It was fun to watch them open a new door each day before Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The little squishies have a good texture. My 5 year old LOVES them. This was a very decently priced item.
customer_reviews.author: Katey Davis

customer_reviews.title: Buy Something Else
customer_reviews.text: The toys in this advent calendar are, in my opinion, trash. They're sticky and very, very cheaply made. The 4 that we've opened so far have terrible paint jobs where the eyes and other features are painted in locations other than the dots that they're probably intended to be. I would purchase something else. These will definitely not last the month.
customer_reviews.author: sdj2013

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are the saddest squishies I've ever seen. Today's squishy was partially chopped off. The rest have been flat and sad. I would not recommend this product for children.
customer_reviews.author: Oliwest

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase as my daughter was very excited to count the days down till Christmas with this product! will recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't spend over $20 on this.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was going to give 3 stars but my 9 yo daughter loves these gooey squishies. And she told me to at least give it 4 (because I refused to give it a 5 star rating. For $20 it is worth it to see her smile every night that she opens a new numbered square. The box came smashed, though. Don't know that I can fault the seller since it was shipped by Amazon and was put into one of those thin, yellow, bubble wrap, bags.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: If I could have given it zero Stars I would have
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this, usually Advent calendars is an actual calendar. This piece of garbage is just a box with no calendar that you just take out the box of all 25 emojis at once.myself and my daughter were very disappointed. It is not a real advent calendar
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute advent calendar but the paint rubs off the squishy as soon as you touch it. Now it’s too late to get a new advent calendar this year but I wouldn’t recommend this because the paint rubs off. My son still has the squishy guys but you can’t see any of the details because now they’re all just one color.
customer_reviews.author: Reyes

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is loving it!!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old is having fun with this advent calendar. I'm that mom who makes her teenagers open advents every year!! They love it, and I'm thrilled they still do. This one is fun and she's digging it!
customer_reviews.author: StellyK

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DON'T waste your MONEY! These are the kind of crappy toys you get out of a quarter machine in a restaurant! What a waste of MONEY and it's not a calendar either it's 24 boxes with numbers on them! DUMB!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dunigan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 year old granddaughter and just gave it to her. She loves it! Great price and very pretty. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Belacic

customer_reviews.title: Autism friendly
customer_reviews.text: It's a great memory toy that we use for our autistic son. It's a good learning tool that he can make small steps towards memory. Simple and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel S. Coimbra

product_meta.title: LUDILO Christmas Advent Calendar 2019 Countdown Calendars Toys for Kids Christmas Mochi Squishy Toys 24Pcs Different Cute Mochi Animals Relief Stress Toys Unique Advent Calendars for Girls Boys
product_meta.description:
Counting Down the Days Until Christmas Makes Waiting for Christmas Holiday More Fun Than Ever! 

Countdown to Christmas Different Surprise Every Day!
The countdown to Christmas is an exciting time for children and one way to heighten the holiday anticipation is with a toy advent calendar 2019!
Features 24 fun Surprises of Mochi Animals Squishies Toys from December 1 to December 24, Open a new door each day and find what's waiting behind it.
The Christmas toys of Patience
The kid's advent calendar is also a great way to teach children numbers, The concept of time and the art of patience!
As Christmas gets closer, Help your child count down the days until Christmas!
Product Specification
Gift Box Size: 8.6*13*1.4inch ; Package Weight:0.4kg
Package Including Santa Avatar, Snowman, Unicorn, Rabbit, Chicken, Bear and so on.
Makes a Perfect Christmas Gift! 
If you are looking for something to entertain your kids for the Christmas holiday, This Cute Mochi Animals Squishy Toys set advent calendar is a good choice.
Our Countdown Advent Calendar 2019 is thoughtfully designed with 24 numbered doors behind which small surprises can be hidden for each day.
This adorable advent calendars for kids have fun surprises hidden behind each door, Count down the days until Christmas with your little ones!
Notice:
1. Mochi squishes are not edible. Please do NOT put it into your mouth.
2.NOT suitable for children under 3 years old.
3. If over-squeezed, the paint on the mochi squishes toys may fall off.
4. When they are dirty, these squishy toys could be rinsed with warm water and soap directly or use scotch tape to clean.
